Connect to the network to enroll
System patches allow to increase stability and fix issues without performing a full-scale system update.
A new system patch is available
"We've updated our Privacy Policy. Please read it carefully before updating your system. "
"You must agree to our updated Privacy Policy before you can update your system. "
Download required updates when connected to Wi-Fi
Download required updates when connected to WLAN
"Update MIUI automatically at night when you aren't using the device"
"Android devices can't install ROM from exFAT SD cards. Copy the ROM package to internal storage and try again."
"Can't install ROM from this SD card"
"The update package you selected (%s) is older than the current version. Using this package directly may lead to errors. It's best to wipe data before proceeding to the next step."
Your device will reboot automatically to update to MIUI version %s.
Your device will update to MIUI version %s.
"You're going to revert to MIUI version %s. Your personal data will be erased. Make sure to back up anything you want to keep before you start the process."
Your personal data will be erased. Make sure to back up anything you want to keep before proceeding.
Updates will be installed between 2:00 and 5:00 AM if the battery is at least 30% full.
Updates will be installed between 2:00 and 5:00 AM.
Discuss new features in Mi Community
Something went wrong. Wait a minute or two and try again.
I understand the difference between ROM versions
"You can't update to this version directly now. Apply for an update (%1$s)? We'll notify you when %1$s is available for your device. Until then, you'll keep receiving regular updates."

"Some things will change after you upgrade to stable ROM. Here's what: 1. Root access will be restricted even if you allowed it previously. 2. Various features of the Beta ROM won't be available in its stable versions."
MIUI will be updated to a new version (%s). This update may erase your data.
"MIUI will be updated to a new version (%s). This update won't erase your data."
Make sure the path to the update package contains only letters and numbers.

"There isn't enough free space for an update in the cache partition of your device's storage. Tap \"Reboot\" to clear the cache partition and reboot your device. Your data won't be affected by this action."
Not enough space in cache partition
Updates will be installed between 2:00 and 5:00 AM if the battery is at least %s full.
Updates will be installed between 2:00 and 5:00 AM.
Updates are ready to install. Tap \"Reboot\" to finish.
"Couldn't update due to insufficient storage. Free up storage space and try again."
Use this feature to receive updates earlier than other people

Tell us what you think about the new version
"Tap to learn what's new in this version"
You can explore new features now
Tap to learn about new features
Share your thoughts with Mi Fans
Updated successfully! Tap to learn more.
If you have a plan with unlimited data, you can download updates automatically using mobile data. After you turn this feature on, updates will be downloaded during the set period of time.
Download updates automatically during set period of time using mobile data
"You're using mobile network now. Downloading updates may generate additional data fees. You can download updates now or wait until your device connects to Wi-Fi."
"Your device isn't connected to WLAN. Using mobile data may generate additional fees."
"You're using mobile network now. Downloading updates may generate additional data fees. You can download updates now or wait until your device connects to Wi-Fi and installs updates automatically."
"You're using mobile network now. Downloading updates may generate additional data fees. You can download updates now or wait until your device connects to WLAN and installs updates automatically."
Looks like the battery was low at night
Looks like the device was off at night
Your update (%1$s) is ready to download
Your update (%1$s) is ready to install
Download ROM and try updating again
You can apply for an update (%s)
You can apply for an update
Get the latest updates for your device.
Get the latest updates for your device.
Sign in to your Mi Account
Sign in to your Mi Account
"This app couldn't get root access. Try again."
Wait until your device has finished updating and try again.

Updater allows you to keep MIUI and its features up to date. After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data (including the data about devices which require updates) will be deleted from this device and the servers. Refusing to update your device might bring security risks. Revoke authorization anyway?

"Looks like this device isn't connected to the network. Connect to Wi-Fi or insert a SIM card to activate this device. Activation makes your device eligible for warranty services. You won't be able to use this device unless it's activated."

"Looks like this device isn't connected to the network. Connect to WLAN or insert a SIM card to activate this device. Activation makes your device eligible for warranty services. You won't be able to use this device unless it's activated."
"Couldn't connect to the server. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Connection timed out. Check your network settings.
"Your device doesn't have enough memory to enter Recovery mode and update your system. Try using Mi PC Suite instead: http://zhushou.xiaomi.com"
Use Mi PC Suite to update your system
Charge your device to at least 15% to update.
Make sure the charger is connected to your device throughout the update.
I understand the risks of root access

Allowing root access is extremely risky and may expose your device and personal data to attacks from malicious apps. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from allowing root access.
MIUI will download updates automatically when your device is connected to Wi-Fi.
Download updates when connected to Wi-Fi and install at night?
"MIUI will install updates when you aren't using your device."
"Check your network settings and try again. If you still can't download updates after that, report this issue using the \"Feedback\" app."
Something went wrong. Tap OK to report this error.

"You aren't connected to a Wi-Fi network. Using your mobile data connection to download the update will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan's data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees."

"You aren't connected to a WLAN network. Using your mobile data connection to download the update will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan's data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees."
To download this update, connect to a Wi-Fi network.
To get root access, connect to a Wi-Fi network.
"Your device is too full to download this update. Clean up your device's storage and try again."
Update selected system apps automatically after MIUI is updated
You can update the following system apps automatically
Update selected system apps automatically when your device is locked and connected to Wi-Fi after MIUI is updated

Switching to a different ROM requires erasing data on your device. Erased items include photos, songs, notes, and other items. The items will be erased after you tap Reboot now when the new version is downloaded. Back up all important items to be able to restore them in the future.
Fifth day of Chinese New Year
Fourth day of Chinese New Year
Second day of Chinese New Year
Seventh day of Chinese New Year

Third day of Chinese New Year
Your device will update between 2:00AM and 5:00AM
Wait a minute or two and try again.
This app uses the Updater Service to obtain root access to the required source files.
Downloads have been paused. You can resume them any time in the Updater app.
Using your mobile data connection to watch videos will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data usage limit, your carrier could charge you fees.
"Couldn't verify the source of this update. Try downloading it again."

"This update includes upgrading Android version. The apps below weren't optimized for it and might contain severe compatibility issues. You can update anyway, skip this update, or update the apps below and try again."
